title.oldValue: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms and structures
title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms

description.oldValue:
Organizations and teams now have the flexibility
to title and structure goals in line with their own goal setting methodology
and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.
description.newValue: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.
